entity.name: Eric Garcetti
entity.description: Mayor of Los Angeles Eric Garcetti

text: @MayorOfLA You should not be reopening the city. Los Angeles is on fire with COVID-19 cases. You are going to make it worse and get many people killed. Also, fire Michel Moore and defund the police. Do all of the above and start being a decent, responsible human being, at MINIMUM.
